subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Joe Corvo scored three goals against the team that traded him last month and Cam Ward stopped 16 shots Sunday in the Carolina Hurricanes’ 5-1 victory over the visiting Ottawa Senators.
snippet: Joe Corvo scored three goals against the team that traded him last month and Cam Ward stopped 16 shots Sunday in the Carolina Hurricanes’ 5-1 victory over the visiting Ottawa Senators.
